Title: Center CB pump ball valve 22mm x 1.1/2" Brass
Description: This Center CB 22mm x 1 1/2" ball valve offers threaded connections and screwdriver operation.  A ball valve is a type of quarter-turn valve featuring a hollow, perforated ball that pivots to control the flow of a fluid. The valve is open when the ball's hole is in line with flow and closed when pivoted to 90Â°. The long lasting reliability of ball valves makes them popular in a wide range of settings.

Title: Center CB brass ball type pump valve 28mm x 1.1/2"
Description: Used to isolate a central heating circulating pump, this Center CB 28mm ball-type pump valve uses an internal ball operated by a screwdriver slot to isolate water flow. Ideal for installation where space is limited, this compact valve has a 28mm compression joint on one end for connection to 28mm copper pipe. At the opposite end, a 1 1/2" nut and washer securely attaches onto the circulating pump's flange. Manufactured in hot-forged brass, this pump valve offers durability and hassle-free operation.

Feature 1: Connects domestic circulation pumps and copper pipes
Feature 2: Isolation point for removal of circulation pump
